Ash Fontana 27 March 2011

A picture worth a thousand points

To celebrate integrating with Instagram we have launched an exciting competition with Virgin America.

Each week, the most-liked Instagram photo taken at a Virgin America-related place wins 1000 bonus Elevate points.

Visit the competition page for details on how to enter.
